document.full_text: morocco arrested three people over a bomb attack on a cafe in the tourist city of marrakesh last week that killed 16 people, and said the chief suspect showed "loyalty" to al qaeda.
document.title: morocco arrests 3 marrakesh cafe bomb suspects
lines_and_colors: morocco arrested three people over a bomb attack on a cafe in the tourist city of marrakesh last week that killed 16 people, and said the chief suspect showed "loyalty" to al qaeda.
